How to Install¶

  1. Pip install AIMinex from PyPI (Not available yet)

    1. Download AIMinex package

    2. In the terminal, navigate to the AIMinex folder (run “cd AIMinex”)

    3. Run “pip install dist/AIMinex-0.0.1-py3-none-any.whl” or “Pip install .”

    4. Type “aiminex” to run

AIMinex
